item.title: Track Hurricane Melissa's path through the Caribbean
item.description: Hurricane Melissa strengthened into a powerful Category 5 storm on Monday. CBS News meteorologist Rob Marciano has the latest on its path.

item.title: Minnesota man arrested for threatening Pam Bondi in TikTok post
item.description: A TikTok user was arrested earlier this month for threatening Attorney General Pam Bondi.

item.title: Missed paychecks, benefit lapses increase pressure for shutdown deal
item.description: The government shutdown stretched into Day 27 on Monday as the stalemate over how to reopen the government continues. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa expected to cause major damage in Jamaica
item.description: Hurricane Melissa was upgraded to a Category 5 storm in the Atlantic and is expected to cause major damage in Jamaica. CBS News' Jason Allen has more ...

item.title: 10/25: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Jamaica braces for Hurricane Melissa after it passes by Dominican Republic; Paris cemetery draws millions to American rock starâ€™s grave
